key.name: combine-batteries
key.description: If true, sum the power readings from all available batteries.

key.name: hide-na
key.description: If true, hide the N/A status when the battery status is neither charging nor discharging.

key.name: show-minus-sign
key.description: Whether to display a minus sign before the power draw when discharging.

key.name: pad-single-digit
key.summary: Pad single-digit power draw with leading zero
key.description: Whether to pad single-digit power draw values with a leading zero.
